sentence.Network_en: He took up a 10 year lease on the house at Rossie Priory.
sentence.Network_cn: 他签了一份10年租约，租下了罗茜大宅的房子。

sentence.Network_en: In the condition of the same refractory brick performance brick should be chosen priory.
sentence.Network_cn: 并提出在耐火砖理化指标相同的条件下,应优先选用国产耐火砖.

sentence.Network_en: A nun in charge of a priory or ranking next below the abbess of an abbey.
sentence.Network_cn: 由小修道院院长主持的或由女修道院院长主持的修道院.

list.abs: ”“我们或许可以先验地（a priori）推出，活力之绝对毁灭不会出现；因为倘若假定上帝赋与物质的力可以被人类的作用加以毁灭或创生 …
先天的（a priori）：独立于经验而且是经验的先决条件先天判断的标志就是它的普遍必然性（康德也称之为“客观性”）。
printing aparatus 印佣设备priori information 事前信息prism (1)棱镜(2)棱柱
a class of identification method based on a priori information for time - varying process ., 一类基于先验信息的时变参数辨识算法.
标签: Bayes公式, 先验机率（priori probability）, 全机率公式, 分割（partition）, 后验机率（posteriori probability）, 条件机率, 机.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French priorie, medieval Latin prioria, from Latin prior 'elder, superior' (see prior)

entry.def: A priory is a place where a small group of monks live and work together.

example.tran: 霍利岛上的林迪斯芳修道院

means.word_mean: 1. religious residence in a monastery governed by a prior or a convent governed by a prioress
